name: Noughts & Crosses
description:
Kill some time and get into the groove by playing some simple and fun Noughts & Crosses with family and friends!

This was developed over 2 evenings to help reinvigorate my game dev journey after being stuck in "code block".

I hope you all enjoy!

Music obtained from https://www.playonloop.com/
Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
